ayas.arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Successful indeed are the believers
ayas.transliteration: qad aflaḥal mu-minūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى صَلَاتِهِمْ خَـٰشِعُونَ
ayas.translation: Who are humble in their prayers,
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna hum fī ṣalātihim khāshi`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَنِ ٱللَّغْوِ مُعْرِضُونَ
ayas.translation: And who shun vain conversation,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum `anillaghwi mu`riḍūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِلزَّكَوٰةِ فَـٰعِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And who are payers of the poor-due;
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum lilzzakāti fā`ilūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَـٰفِظُونَ
ayas.translation: And who guard their modesty -
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum lifurūjihim ḥāfiẓūn

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ
ayas.translation: Save from their wives or the (slaves) that their right hands possess, for then they are not blameworthy,
ayas.transliteration: illā `alā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīn

ayas.arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ
ayas.translation: But whoso craveth beyond that, such are transgressors -
ayas.transliteration: famanib-taghā warā-a dhālika fa-ulā-ika humul `ādūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَـٰنَـٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ
ayas.translation: And who are shepherds of their pledge and their covenant,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum li-amānātihim wa`ahdihim rā`ūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَوَٰتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ
ayas.translation: And who pay heed to their prayers.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum `alā ṣalawātihim yuḥāfiẓūn

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
ayas.translation: These are the heirs
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ika humul wārithūn

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلْفِرْدَوْسَ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
ayas.translation: Who will inherit paradise. There they will abide.
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūnal firdawsa hum fīhā khālidūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن سُلَـٰلَةٍ مِّن طِينٍ
ayas.translation: Verily We created man from a product of wet earth;
ayas.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnal-insāna min sulālatim min ṭīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُطْفَةً فِى قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
ayas.translation: Then placed him as a drop (of seed) in a safe lodging;
ayas.transliteration: thumma ja`alnāhu nuṭfatan fī qarārin makīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ خَلَقْنَا ٱلنُّطْفَةَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْعَلَقَةَ مُضْغَةً فَخَلَقْنَا ٱلْمُضْغَةَ عِظَـٰمًا فَكَسَوْنَا ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ لَحْمًا ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَـٰهُ خَلْقًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ أَحْسَنُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Then fashioned We the drop a clot, then fashioned We the clot a little lump, then fashioned We the little lump bones, then clothed the bones with flesh, and then produced it as another creation. So blessed be Allah, the Best of creators!
ayas.transliteration: thumma khalaqnan nuṭfata `alaqatan fakhalaqnal `alaqata muḍghatan fakhalaqnal muḍghata `iẓāman fakasawnal `iẓāma laḥman thumma ansha-nāhu khalqan ākhar ۚ fatabārakallāhu aḥsanul khāliqīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُم بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَيِّتُونَ
ayas.translation: Then lo! after that ye surely die.
ayas.transliteration: thumma innakum ba`da dhālika lamayyitūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ تُبْعَثُونَ
ayas.translation: Then lo! on the Day of Resurrection ye are raised (again).
ayas.transliteration: thumma innakum yawmal qiyāmati tub`athūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعَ طَرَآئِقَ وَمَا كُنَّا عَنِ ٱلْخَلْقِ غَـٰفِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And We have created above you seven paths, and We are never unmindful of creation.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā fawqakum sab`a ṭarā-iqa wa mā kunnā `anil khalqi ghāfilīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And we send down from the sky water in measure, and We give it lodging in the earth, and lo! We are Able to withdraw it.
ayas.transliteration: wa-anzalnā minas samā-i mā-an biqadarin fa-askannāhu fil-arḍ ۖ wa innā `alā dhahābin bihi laqādirūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَـٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
ayas.translation: Then We produce for you therewith gardens of date-palms and grapes, wherein is much fruit for you and whereof ye eat;
ayas.transliteration: fa-ansha-nā lakum bihi jannātin min nakhīlin wa-a`nābin lakum fīhā fawākihu kathīratun wa minhā ta-kulūn

ayas.arabic: وَشَجَرَةً تَخْرُجُ مِن طُورِ سَيْنَآءَ تَنۢبُتُ بِٱلدُّهْنِ وَصِبْغٍ لِّلْـَٔاكِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And a tree that springeth forth from Mount Sinai that groweth oil and relish for the eaters.
ayas.transliteration: washajaratan takhruju min ṭūri saynā-a tanbutu bid duhni waṣibghin lil-ākilīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ لَعِبْرَةً ۖ نُّسْقِيكُم مِّمَّا فِى بُطُونِهَا وَلَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ
ayas.translation: And lo! in the cattle there is verily a lesson for you. We give you to drink of that which is in their bellies, and many uses have ye in them, and of them do ye eat;
ayas.transliteration: wa inna lakum fil-an`āmi la`ibrah ۖ nusqīkum mimmā fī buṭūnihā walakum fīhā manāfi`u kathīratun wa minhā ta-kulūn

ayas.arabic: وَعَلَيْهَا وَعَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ تُحْمَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And on them and on the ship ye are carried.
ayas.transliteration: wa`alayhā wa`alal-fulki tuḥmalūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And We verily sent Noah unto his folk, and he said: O my people! Serve Allah. Ye have no other Allah save Him. Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ayas.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi faqāla yāqawmi'-budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruh ۖ afalā tattaqūn

ayas.arabic: فَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَؤُا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَنزَلَ مَلَـٰٓئِكَةً مَّا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِىٓ ءَابَآئِنَا ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: But the chieftains of his folk, who disbelieved, said: This is only a mortal like you who would make himself superior to you. Had Allah willed, He surely could have sent down angels. We heard not of this in the case of our fathers of old.
ayas.transliteration: faqālal-mala-ul ladhīna kafarū min qawmihi mā hādhā illā basharun mithlukum yurīdu an yatafaḍḍala `alaykum walaw shā-allāhu la-anzala malā-ikatan mā sami`nā bihādhā fī ābā-inal-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌ فَتَرَبَّصُوا۟ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayas.translation: He is only a man in whom is a madness, so watch him for a while.
ayas.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
ayas.translation: He said: My Lord! Help me because they deny me.
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbin-ṣurnī bimā kadhhabūn

ayas.arabic: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ أَنِ ٱصْنَعِ ٱلْفُلْكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا وَوَحْيِنَا فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ ۙ فَٱسْلُكْ فِيهَا مِن كُلٍّ زَوْجَيْنِ ٱثْنَيْنِ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْقَوْلُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَلَا تُخَـٰطِبْنِى فِى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّهُم مُّغْرَقُونَ
ayas.translation: Then We inspired in him, saying: Make the ship under Our eyes and Our inspiration. Then, when Our command cometh and the oven gusheth water, introduce therein of every (kind) two spouses, and thy household save him thereof against whom the Word hath already gone forth. And plead not with Me on behalf of those who have done wrong. Lo! they will be drowned.
ayas.transliteration: fa-awḥaynā ilayhi aniṣ-na`il fulka bi-a`yuninā wawaḥyinā fa-idhā jā-a amrunā wafārat tannūru fasluk fīhā min kullin zawjaynith-nayni wa-ahlaka illā man sabaqa `alayhil qawlu minhum ۖ walā tukhāṭibnī fil ladhīna ẓalamū ۖ innahum mughraqūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتَ أَنتَ وَمَن مَّعَكَ عَلَى ٱلْفُلْكِ فَقُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى نَجَّىٰنَا مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: And when thou art on board the ship, thou and whoso is with thee, then say: Praise be to Allah Who hath saved us from the wrongdoing folk!
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhas-tawayta anta wa man ma`aka `alal-fulki faqulil ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī najjānā minal qawmiẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِى مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْمُنزِلِينَ
ayas.translation: And say: My Lord! Cause me to land at a blessed landing-place, for Thou art Best of all who bring to land.
ayas.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzilnī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayrul munzilīn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبْتَلِينَ
ayas.translation: Lo! herein verily are portents, for lo! We are ever putting (mankind) to the test.
ayas.transliteration: inna fī dhālika la-āyātin wa in kunnā lamubtalīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قَرْنًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayas.translation: Then, after them, We brought forth another generation;
ayas.transliteration: thumma ansha-nā min ba`dihim qarnan ākharīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: And we sent among them a messenger of their own, saying: Serve Allah, Ye have no other Allah save Him. Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ayas.transliteration: fa-arsalnā fīhim rasūlan minhum ani'-budullāha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruh ۖ afalā tattaqūn

ayas.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِلِقَآءِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَأَتْرَفْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا تَأْكُلُونَ مِنْهُ وَيَشْرَبُ مِمَّا تَشْرَبُونَ
ayas.translation: And the chieftains of his folk, who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter, and whom We had made soft in the life of the world, said: This is only a mortal like you, who eateth of that whereof ye eat and drinketh of that ye drink.
ayas.transliteration: waqālal-mala-u min qawmihil ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū biliqā-il-ākhirati wa-atrafnāhum fil ḥayātid dunyā mā hādhā illā basharun mithlukum ya-kulu mimmā ta-kulūna minhu wayashrabu mimmā tashrabūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَئِنْ أَطَعْتُم بَشَرًا مِّثْلَكُمْ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّخَـٰسِرُونَ
ayas.translation: If ye were to obey a mortal like yourselves, then, lo! ye surely would be losers.
ayas.transliteration: wala-in aṭa`tum basharan mithlakum innakum idhal lakhāsirūn

ayas.arabic: أَيَعِدُكُمْ أَنَّكُمْ إِذَا مِتُّمْ وَكُنتُمْ تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَنَّكُم مُّخْرَجُونَ
ayas.translation: Doth he promise you that you, when ye are dead and have become dust and bones, will (again) be brought forth?
ayas.transliteration: aya`idukum annakum idhā mittum wakuntum turāban wa`iẓāman annakum mukhrajūn

ayas.arabic: هَيْهَاتَ هَيْهَاتَ لِمَا تُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Begone, begone, with that which ye are promised!
ayas.transliteration: hayhāta hayhāta limā tū`adūn

ayas.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَبْعُوثِينَ
ayas.translation: There is naught but our life of the world; we die and we live, and we shall not be raised (again).
ayas.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunad dunyā namūtu wanaḥyā wa mā naḥnu bimab`ūthīn

ayas.arabic: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا وَمَا نَحْنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayas.translation: He is only a man who hath invented a lie about Allah. We are not going to put faith in him.
ayas.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulunif-tarā `alallāhi kadhiban wa mā naḥnu lahu bimu-minīn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى بِمَا كَذَّبُونِ
ayas.translation: He said: My Lord! Help me because they deny me.
ayas.transliteration: qāla rabbin-ṣurnī bimā kadhhabūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ عَمَّا قَلِيلٍ لَّيُصْبِحُنَّ نَـٰدِمِينَ
ayas.translation: He said: In a little while they surely will become repentant.
ayas.transliteration: qāla `ammā qalīlin layuṣbiḥunna nādimīn

ayas.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ غُثَآءً ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: So the (Awful) Cry overtook them rightfully, and We made them like as wreckage (that a torrent hurleth). A far removal for wrongdoing folk!
ayas.transliteration: fa-akhadhat-humuṣ ṣayḥatu bil ḥaqqi faja`alnāhum ghuthā-ā ۚ fabu`dal lilqawmiẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ
ayas.translation: Then after them We brought forth other generations.
ayas.transliteration: thumma ansha-nā min ba`dihim qurūnan ākharīn

ayas.arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
ayas.translation: No nation can outstrip its term, nor yet postpone it.
ayas.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta-khirūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتْرَا ۖ كُلَّ مَا جَآءَ أُمَّةً رَّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ ۚ فَأَتْبَعْنَا بَعْضَهُم بَعْضًا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ ۚ فَبُعْدًا لِّقَوْمٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: Then We sent our messengers one after another. Whenever its messenger came unto a nation they denied him; so We caused them to follow one another (to disaster) and We made them bywords. A far removal for folk who believe not!
ayas.transliteration: thumma arsalnā rusulanā tatrā ۖ kulla mā jā-a ummatan rasūluhā kadhhabūh ۚ fa-atba`nā ba`ḍahum ba`ḍan waja`alnāhum aḥādīth ۚ fabu`dal liqawmin lā yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our tokens and a clear warrant
ayas.transliteration: thumma arsalnā mūsā wa-akhāhu hārūna bi-āyātinā wasulṭānin mubīn

ayas.arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَالِينَ
ayas.translation: Unto Pharaoh and his chiefs, but they scorned (them) and they were despotic folk.
ayas.transliteration: ilā fir`awna wa mala-ihi fastakbarū wakānū qawman `ālīn

ayas.arabic: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ لِبَشَرَيْنِ مِثْلِنَا وَقَوْمُهُمَا لَنَا عَـٰبِدُونَ
ayas.translation: And they said: Shall we put faith in two mortals like ourselves, and whose folk are servile unto us?
ayas.transliteration: faqālū anu-minu libasharayni mithlinā waqawmuhumā lanā `ābidūn

ayas.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُهْلَكِينَ
ayas.translation: So they denied them, and became of those who were destroyed.
ayas.transliteration: fakadhhabūhumā fakānū minal muhlakīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
ayas.translation: And We verily gave Moses the Scripture, that haply they might go aright.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsal kitāba la`allahum yahtadūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ وَأُمَّهُۥٓ ءَايَةً وَءَاوَيْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبْوَةٍ ذَاتِ قَرَارٍ وَمَعِينٍ
ayas.translation: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a portent, and We gave them refuge on a height, a place of flocks and watersprings.
ayas.transliteration: waja`alnab-na maryama wa-ummahu āyatan wa-āwaynāhumā ilā rabwatin dhāti qarārin wa ma`īn

ayas.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: O ye messengers! Eat of the good things, and do right. Lo! I am Aware of what ye do.
ayas.transliteration: yā-ayyuhar rusulu kulū minaṭ ṭayyibāti wa`malū ṣāliḥā ۖ innī bimā ta`malūna `alīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُونِ
ayas.translation: And lo! this your religion is one religion and I am your Lord, so keep your duty unto Me.
ayas.transliteration: wa inna hādhihi ummatukum ummatan wāḥidatan wa-ana rabbukum fattaqūn

ayas.arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ زُبُرًا ۖ كُلُّ حِزْبٍۭ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ فَرِحُونَ
ayas.translation: But they (mankind) have broken their religion among them into sects, each group rejoicing in its tenets.
ayas.transliteration: fataqaṭṭa`ū amrahum baynahum zuburā ۖ kullu ḥizbin bimā ladayhim fariḥūn

ayas.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ فِى غَمْرَتِهِمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayas.translation: So leave them in their error till a time.
ayas.transliteration: fadharhum fī ghamratihim ḥattā ḥīn

ayas.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٍ وَبَنِينَ
ayas.translation: Think they that in the wealth and sons wherewith We provide them
ayas.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīn

ayas.arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ ۚ بَل لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayas.translation: We hasten unto them with good things? Nay, but they perceive not.
ayas.transliteration: nusāri`u lahum fil khayrāt ۚ bal lā yash`urūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ خَشْيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! those who go in awe for fear of their Lord.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mushfiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who believe in the revelations of their Lord,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum bi-āyāti rabbihim yu-minūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِرَبِّهِمْ لَا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who ascribe not partners unto their Lord,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna hum birabbihim lā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْتُونَ مَآ ءَاتَوا۟ وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ وَجِلَةٌ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ رَٰجِعُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who give that which they give with hearts afraid because they are about to return unto their Lord,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna yu-tūna mā ātaw waqulūbuhum wajilatun annahum ilā rabbihim rāji`ūn

ayas.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَهُمْ لَهَا سَـٰبِقُونَ
ayas.translation: These race for the good things, and they shall win them in the race.
ayas.transliteration: ulā-ika yusāri`ūna fil khayrāti wahum lahā sābiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا ۖ وَلَدَيْنَا كِتَـٰبٌ يَنطِقُ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: And we task not any soul beyond its scope, and with Us is a Record which speaketh the truth, and they will not be wronged.
ayas.transliteration: walā nukallifu nafsan illā wus`ahā ۖ waladaynā kitābun yanṭiqu bil ḥaqq ۚ wahum lā yuẓlamūn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ قُلُوبُهُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا وَلَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلٌ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمْ لَهَا عَـٰمِلُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay, but their hearts are in ignorance of this (Qur'an), and they have other works, besides, which they are doing;
ayas.transliteration: bal qulūbuhum fī ghamratim min hādhā walahum a`mālun min dūni dhālika hum lahā `āmilūn

ayas.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَخَذْنَا مُتْرَفِيهِم بِٱلْعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمْ يَجْـَٔرُونَ
ayas.translation: Till when We grasp their luxurious ones with the punishment, behold! they supplicate.
ayas.transliteration: ḥattā idhā akhadhnā mutrafīhim bil `adhābi idhā hum yaj-arūn

ayas.arabic: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Supplicate not this day! Assuredly ye will not be helped by Us.
ayas.transliteration: lā taj-arul yawm ۖ innakum minnā lā tunṣarūn

ayas.arabic: قَدْ كَانَتْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ تَنكِصُونَ
ayas.translation: My revelations were recited unto you, but ye used to turn back on your heels,
ayas.transliteration: qad kānat āyātī tutlā `alaykum fakuntum `alā a`qābikum tankiṣūn

ayas.arabic: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ بِهِۦ سَـٰمِرًا تَهْجُرُونَ
ayas.translation: In scorn thereof. Nightly did ye rave together.
ayas.transliteration: mustakbirīna bihi sāmiran tahjurūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَدَّبَّرُوا۟ ٱلْقَوْلَ أَمْ جَآءَهُم مَّا لَمْ يَأْتِ ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: Have they not pondered the Word, or hath that come unto them which came not unto their fathers of old?
ayas.transliteration: afalam yaddabbarul qawla am jā-ahum mā lam ya-ti ābā-ahumul-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
ayas.translation: Or know they not their messenger, and so reject him?
ayas.transliteration: am lam ya`rifū rasūlahum fahum lahu munkirūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۚ بَلْ جَآءَهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ
ayas.translation: Or say they: There is a madness in him? Nay, but he bringeth them the Truth; and most of them are haters of the Truth.
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūna bihi jinnah ۚ bal jā-ahum bil ḥaqqi wa-aktharuhum lilḥaqqi kārihūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ لَفَسَدَتِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهِنَّ ۚ بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِذِكْرِهِمْ فَهُمْ عَن ذِكْرِهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
ayas.translation: And if the Truth had followed their desires, verily the heavens and the earth and whosoever is therein had been corrupted. Nay, We have brought them their Reminder, but from their Reminder they now turn away.
ayas.transliteration: walawit-taba`al ḥaqqu ahwā-ahum lafasadatis samāwātu wal-arḍu wa man fīhinn ۚ bal ataynāhum bidhikrihim fahum `an dhikrihim mu`riḍūn

ayas.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ خَرْجًا فَخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
ayas.translation: Or dost thou ask of them (O Muhammad) any tribute? But the bounty of thy Lord is better, for He is Best of all who make provision.
ayas.transliteration: am tas-aluhum kharjan fakharāju rabbika khayr ۖ wahuwa khayrur rāziqīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَتَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And lo! thou summonest them indeed unto a straight path.
ayas.transliteration: wa innaka latad`ūhum ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَـٰكِبُونَ
ayas.translation: And lo! those who believe not in the Hereafter are indeed astray from the path.
ayas.transliteration: wa innal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati `aniṣ ṣirāṭi lanākibūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayas.translation: Though We had mercy on them and relieved them of the harm afflicting them, they still would wander blindly on in their contumacy.
ayas.transliteration: walaw raḥimnāhum wakashafnā mā bihim min ḍurrin lalajjū fī ṭughyānihim ya`mahūn

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: Already have We grasped them with punishment, but they humble not themselves unto their Lord, nor do they pray,
ayas.transliteration: walaqad akhadhnāhum bil `adhābi famas-takānū lirabbihim wa mā yataḍarra`ūn

ayas.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
ayas.translation: Until, when We open for them the gate of extreme punishment, behold! they are aghast thereat.
ayas.transliteration: ḥattā idhā fataḥnā `alayhim bāban dhā `adhābin shadīdin idhā hum fīhi mublisūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: He it is Who hath created for you ears and eyes and hearts. Small thanks give ye!
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī ansha-a lakumus sam`a wal-abṣāra wal-af-idah ۚ qalīlan mā tashkurūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
ayas.translation: And He it is Who hath sown you broadcast in the earth, and unto Him ye will be gathered.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī dhara-akum fil-arḍi wa ilayhi tuḥsharūn

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayas.translation: And He it is Who giveth life and causeth death, and His is the difference of night and day. Have ye then no sense?
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī yuḥyī wayumītu walahukh-tilāful layli wan nahār ۚ afalā ta`qilūn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay, but they say the like of that which said the men of old;
ayas.transliteration: bal qālū mithla mā qālal-awwalūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
ayas.translation: They say: When we are dead and have become (mere) dust and bones, shall we then, forsooth, be raised again?
ayas.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mitnā wakunnā turāban wa`iẓāman a-innā lamab`ūthūn

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: We were already promised this, we and our forefathers. Lo! this is naught but fables of the men of old.
ayas.transliteration: laqad wu`idnā naḥnu wa-ābā-unā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīrul-awwalīn

ayas.arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: Unto Whom (belongeth) the earth and whosoever is therein, if ye have knowledge?
ayas.transliteration: qul limanil-arḍu wa man fīhā in kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayas.translation: They will say: Unto Allah. Say: Will ye not then remember?
ayas.transliteration: sayaqūlūna lillāh ۚ qul afalā tadhakkarūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayas.translation: Say: Who is Lord of the seven heavens, and Lord of the Tremendous Throne?
ayas.transliteration: qul man rabbus samāwātis sab`i warabbul `arshil `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayas.translation: They will say: Unto Allah (all that belongeth). Say: Will ye not then keep duty (unto Him)?
ayas.transliteration: sayaqūlūna lillāh ۚ qul afalā tattaqūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: In Whose hand is the dominion over all things and He protecteth, while against Him there is no protection, if ye have knowledge?
ayas.transliteration: qul man biyadihi malakūtu kulli shay-in wahuwa yujīru walā yujāru `alayhi in kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ ۚ قُلْ فَأَنَّىٰ تُسْحَرُونَ
ayas.translation: They will say: Unto Allah (all that belongeth). Say: How then are ye bewitched?
ayas.transliteration: sayaqūlūna lillāh ۚ qul fa-annā tus-ḥarūn

ayas.arabic: بَلْ أَتَيْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
ayas.translation: Nay, but We have brought them the Truth, and lo! they are liars.
ayas.transliteration: bal ataynāhum bil ḥaqqi wa innahum lakādhibūn

ayas.arabic: مَا ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِن وَلَدٍ وَمَا كَانَ مَعَهُۥ مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ ۚ إِذًا لَّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَـٰهٍۭ بِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Allah hath not chosen any son, nor is there any god along with Him; else would each god have assuredly championed that which he created, and some of them would assuredly have overcome others. Glorified be Allah above all that they allege.
ayas.transliteration: mat-takhadhallāhu min waladin wa mā kāna ma`ahu min ilāh ۚ idhal ladhahaba kullu ilāhin bimā khalaqa wala`alā ba`ḍuhum `alā ba`ḍ ۚ subḥānallāhi `ammā yaṣifūn

ayas.arabic: عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayas.translation: Knower of the Invisible and the Visible! and Exalted be He over all that they ascribe as partners (unto Him)!
ayas.transliteration: `ālimil ghaybi wash shahādati fata`ālā `ammā yushrikūn

ayas.arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّى مَا يُوعَدُونَ
ayas.translation: Say: My Lord! If Thou shouldst show me that which they are promised.
ayas.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yū`adūn

ayas.arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجْعَلْنِى فِى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: My Lord! then set me not among the wrongdoing folk.
ayas.transliteration: rabbi falā taj`alnī fil qawmiẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And verily We are Able to show thee that which We have promised them.
ayas.transliteration: wa innā `alā an nuriyaka mā na`iduhum laqādirūn

ayas.arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ ۚ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ
ayas.translation: Repel evil with that which is better. We are Best Aware of that which they allege.
ayas.transliteration: id-fa` bil latī hiya aḥsanus sayyi-ah ۚ naḥnu a`lamu bimā yaṣifūn

ayas.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ
ayas.translation: And say: My Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from suggestions of the evil ones,
ayas.transliteration: waqul rabbi a`ūdhu bika min hamazātish shayāṭīn

ayas.arabic: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أَن يَحْضُرُونِ
ayas.translation: And I seek refuge in Thee, my Lord, lest they be present with me,
ayas.transliteration: wa-a`ūdhu bika rabbi an yaḥḍurūn

ayas.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلْمَوْتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرْجِعُونِ
ayas.translation: Until, when death cometh unto one of them, he saith: My Lord! Send me back,
ayas.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jā-a aḥadahumul mawtu qāla rabbir-ji`ūn

ayas.arabic: لَعَلِّىٓ أَعْمَلُ صَـٰلِحًا فِيمَا تَرَكْتُ ۚ كَلَّآ ۚ إِنَّهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ قَآئِلُهَا ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِم بَرْزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayas.translation: That I may do right in that which I have left behind! But nay! It is but a word that he speaketh; and behind them is a barrier until the day when they are raised.
ayas.transliteration: la`allī a`malu ṣāliḥan fīmā tarakt ۚ kallā ۚ innahā kalimatun huwa qā-iluhā ۖ wa min warā-ihim barzakhun ilā yawmi yub`athūn

ayas.arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And when the trumpet is blown there will be no kinship among them that day, nor will they ask of one another.
ayas.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fiṣ ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasā-alūn

ayas.arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
ayas.translation: Then those whose scales are heavy, they are the successful.
ayas.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulā-ika humul mufliḥūn

ayas.arabic: وَمَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فِى جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ
ayas.translation: And those whose scales are light are those who lose their souls, in hell abiding.
ayas.transliteration: wa man khaffat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulā-ikal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum fī jahannama khālidūn

ayas.arabic: تَلْفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمْ فِيهَا كَـٰلِحُونَ
ayas.translation: The fire burneth their faces, and they are glum therein.
ayas.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumun nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūn

ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayas.translation: (It will be said): Were not My revelations recited unto you, and then ye used to deny them?
ayas.transliteration: alam takun āyātī tutlā `alaykum fakuntum bihā tukadhhibūn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتْ عَلَيْنَا شِقْوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوْمًا ضَآلِّينَ
ayas.translation: They will say: Our Lord! Our evil fortune conquered us, and we were erring folk.
ayas.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat `alaynā shiqwatunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīn

ayas.arabic: رَبَّنَآ أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْهَا فَإِنْ عُدْنَا فَإِنَّا ظَـٰلِمُونَ
ayas.translation: Our Lord! Oh, bring us forth from hence! If we return (to evil) then indeed we shall be wrong-doers.
ayas.transliteration: rabbanā akhrijnā minhā fa-in `udnā fa-innā ẓālimūn

ayas.arabic: قَالَ ٱخْسَـُٔوا۟ فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّمُونِ
ayas.translation: He saith: Begone therein, and speak not unto Me.
ayas.transliteration: qālakh-sa-ū fīhā walā tukallimūn

ayas.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
ayas.translation: Lo! there was a party of My slaves who said: Our Lord! We believe, therefor forgive us and have mercy on us for Thou art Best of all who show mercy;
ayas.transliteration: innahu kāna farīqun min `ibādī yaqūlūna rabbanā āmannā faghfir lanā warḥamnā wa-anta khayrur rāḥimīn

ayas.arabic: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
ayas.translation: But ye chose them for a laughing-stock until they caused you to forget remembrance of Me, while ye laughed at them.
ayas.transliteration: fattakhadhtumūhum sikhriyyan ḥattā ansawkum dhikrī wakuntum minhum taḍ-ḥakūn

ayas.arabic: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
ayas.translation: Lo! I have rewarded them this day forasmuch as they were steadfast in that they, even they, are the triumphant.
ayas.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumul yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humul fā-izūn

ayas.arabic: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
ayas.translation: He will say: How long tarried ye in the earth, counting by years?
ayas.transliteration: qāla kam labithtum fil-arḍi `adada sinīn

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
ayas.translation: They will say: We tarried by a day or part of a day. Ask of those who keep count!
ayas.transliteration: qālū labithnā yawman aw ba`ḍa yawmin fas-alil `āddīn

ayas.arabic: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayas.translation: He will say: Ye tarried but a little if ye only knew.
ayas.transliteration: qāla in labithtum illā qalīlā ۖ law annakum kuntum ta`lamūn

ayas.arabic: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
ayas.translation: Deemed ye then that We had created you for naught, and that ye would not be returned unto Us?
ayas.transliteration: afaḥasibtum annamā khalaqnākum `abathan wa-annakum ilaynā lā turja`ūn

ayas.arabic: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayas.translation: Now Allah be Exalted, the True King! There is no Allah save Him, the Lord of the Throne of Grace.
ayas.transliteration: fata`ālallāhul malikul ḥaqq ۖ lā ilāha illā huwa rabbul `arshil karīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: He who crieth unto any other god along with Allah hath no proof thereof. His reckoning is only with his Lord. Lo! disbelievers will not be successful.
ayas.transliteration: wa man yad`u ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhara lā burhāna lahu bihi fa-innamā ḥisābuhu `inda rabbih ۚ innahu lā yufliḥul kāfirūn

ayas.arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
ayas.translation: And (O Muhammad) say: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for Thou art Best of all who show mercy.
ayas.transliteration: waqul rabbigh-fir warḥam wa-anta khayrur rāḥimīn
